728643f-a.text:
(1)
240 Cannon Ave. (right), adjoining the S.W. corner of Glen Street, showing the Parmelia A. Cannon house. She was the daughter of John S. Hancock and died here in 1911. The house was preserved by her daughter, Mrs. Margaret Susie Cannon Decker until 1923.
July 12, 1923.
By William T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A closer view of the house..
July 29, 1923.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
728643f-a.folder: Cannon Avenue & Glen Street, Staten Island, NY

728644f-a.text:
268 Cannon Ave., west of the S.W. corner of Glen Street, showing the
Charles David Barker Cannon house.
June 29, 1923.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
